snippet: Shagaf closed with a rush and won the $400,000 Gotham Stakes at Aqueduct Racetrack to improve his record to 3-0 and move into contention for the Kentucky Derby.
abstract: Shagaf wins Gotham Stakes horse race at Aqueduct Racetrack.
lead_paragraph: Shagaf closed with a rush and won the $400,000 Gotham Stakes at Aqueduct Racetrack to improve his record to 3-0 and move into contention for the Kentucky Derby.

headline.main: Win at Aqueduct Positions Colt for the Derby
